content.rendered:
The Marbella 4 Piece Outdoor Lounge Set is perfect for all Weather. 

Can be paired with many of our outdoor chairs and tables. The Marbella Lounge Set is suitable for light commercial use only.

Made with a durable, weather resistant resin. UV protected to ensure that the colour will not fade when left outdoors. The non-metallic frame will never unravel, rust or decay. The comfortable, outdoor cushions are 4.5 inches thick. Can be disassembled when not in use. 

Ideal for outdoor venues, but can also be used indoors.

Guaranteed for 12 months in a light commercial use setting.

DIMENSIONS

Sofa: Height 75cm, Width 138cm, Depth 72cm, Seat Height 33cm

Arm Chair: Height 75cm, Width 73cm, Depth 72cm, Seat Height 33cm

Coffee Table: Height 33cm, Width 65cm, Depth 65cm

Requires self assembly. Not crib 5.
